p: The formulation utilizing extract from goat weed has been carried out. Extract of goat weed could be developed into a polyherbal formulation as the wound-healing agent through a topical route. This formulation is composed of Ageratum conyzoides, Ficus religiosa, Curcuma longa, and Tamarindus indica. The result showed that the polyherbal formulation has a good wound-healing effect in rats [ 97].
